extensionName.message: BirdTab - Discover Bird Pictures & Songs in New Tabs

extensionDescription.message: Enhance your Chrome new tab with beautiful bird photos and soothing sounds. Enjoy a refreshing bird background every time.

audioAlt.description: Alt text for audio waveform icon

errorTitle.message: Hmm, the birds seem shy today

errorMessage.message: We're having a bit of trouble spotting our feathered friends. Don't worry, it's usually just a momentary flutter!
errorMessage.description: Error message when bird data fails to load

regionTooltip.message: Choose the region where you'd like to see birds from. You'll still see birds from around the world!

regionHelpText.message: Choose your preferred region for bird discoveries.

autoPlayHelpText.message: Automatically play bird calls in photo mode or videos in video mode with each new tab. Quiet hours will override this when active.

autoPlayTooltip.message: Enable to automatically play bird calls or videos when you open a new tab

quietHoursHelpText.message: Mute bird songs during specified quiet hours.
quietHoursHelpText.description: Help text for quiet hours setting

quietHoursTooltip.message: Enable to automatically turn off auto-play during quiet hours

quietHoursAlt.description: Alt text for quiet hours moon icon

productivityHelpText.message: Enable search box, top sites, and custom shortcuts for enhanced productivity.

productivityTooltip.message: Show search box, most visited sites, and allow custom shortcuts

welcomeDescription1.message: Get ready for a daily dose of avian wonder! Every new tab brings you face-to-face with a stunning bird photograph and fascinating facts.

welcomeDescription2.message: It's like having a window to the bird world right in your browser!

regionSelectionDescription.message: Select your preferred region to see birds commonly found in your area. Don't worry, you'll still get to explore birds from around the world!

regionSelectionHelpText.message: This helps us show you birds that you might spot in your local area. You can change this anytime in the settings.
regionSelectionHelpText.description: Help text for region selection in onboarding

birdCallsTitle.message: Bird Calls: Music to Your Ears?
birdCallsTitle.description: Title for bird calls onboarding step

birdCallsDescription.message: Want to hear the chirps and tweets? Enable auto-play for an immersive birding experience!

autoPlayNote.message: Don't worry, you can always toggle sounds on or off for each bird. This setting just determines the default behavior, and you can change it later if you wish.

reviewPromptMessage.message: Your review would mean the world to us and help other bird enthusiasts discover our extension!

leaveReview.description: Button text to leave a review

confirmResetSettings.message: This will reset all settings to defaults and show the onboarding again. Continue?

errorResettingSettings.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Error resetting settings. Please try again.
errorResettingSettings.description: Error message when resetting settings fails

settingsResetComplete.message:
‚úÖ Settings Reset Complete!

All your BirdTab settings have been restored to their defaults.

Open a new tab to see the setup wizard again.
settingsResetComplete.description: Success message when settings are reset

errorClearingCache.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Error clearing cache. Please try again.
errorClearingCache.description: Error message when clearing cache fails

cacheCleared.message:
üßπ Cache Cleared!

All cached bird images, custom shortcuts, and temporary data have been removed.

This should help if you were experiencing any loading issues.
cacheCleared.description: Success message when cache is cleared

permissionRequired.message:
üîí Permission Required

To use productivity features (search box, most visited sites, and custom shortcuts), BirdTab needs access to your browser's top sites.

You can enable this anytime by toggling the setting again.

somethingWentWrong.message:
‚ö†Ô∏è Something went wrong

We couldn't update your productivity settings. This might be a temporary issue.

Please try again in a moment. If the problem continues, try restarting your browser.
somethingWentWrong.description: Generic error message when something goes wrong

currentLocale.description: Shows current UI locale using predefined message

closeSettings.description: Aria label for close settings button

mostVisitedSitesAriaLabel.message: Most visited sites and custom shortcuts
mostVisitedSitesAriaLabel.description: Aria label for top sites grid

visitSiteAriaLabel.description: Aria label prefix for site links

websiteFallback.description: Fallback text when site title cannot be determined

settingsTooltip.message: Open settings to customize your BirdTab experience

refreshTooltip.message: Load a new bird photo and information

addNewShortcutAriaLabel.description: Aria label for add shortcut button

editShortcutContextMenu.description: Context menu item to edit shortcut

removeShortcutContextMenu.description: Context menu item to remove shortcut

shortcutNameRequired.description: Error message when shortcut name is empty

shortcutUrlRequired.description: Error message when shortcut URL is empty

shortcutUrlInvalid.description: Error message when shortcut URL is invalid

quizModeQuestion.description: Main question text in quiz mode

quizShowResults.description: Button text to show final results

quizStartNewQuiz.description: Button text to start a new quiz

quizExitQuiz.description: Button text to exit quiz mode

quizShareResults.description: Button text to share quiz results as an image

quizShareTitle.description: Title used when sharing quiz results

quizShareText.message: I scored {score}/10 on the BirdTab bird quiz!
quizShareText.description: Text used when sharing quiz results

quizShareCTA.message: Test your bird knowledge at birdtab.app
quizShareCTA.description: Call to action text shown on shared quiz image

quizShareGenerating.description: Button text while generating share image

quizShareError.description: Button text when share image generation fails

quizShareDownload.description: Button to download the share image

quizShareCopyImage.description: Button to copy image to clipboard

quizShareBack.description: Button to return to results page

quizShareOutOf.description: Score display text on share image

quizShareResultsHeader.description: Header for results list on share image

quizShareUnknownBird.description: Fallback text for unknown bird name

quizExitConfirmTitle.description: Title for quiz exit confirmation modal

quizExitConfirmMessage.message: Are you sure you want to exit the quiz? Your progress will be lost.
quizExitConfirmMessage.description: Message for quiz exit confirmation modal

quizScoreExcellent.message: Excellent! You're a true bird expert!

quizScoreGreat.message: Great job! You know your birds well!

quizScoreKeepLearning.message: Keep learning! Every bird expert started somewhere!

quizErrorNotEnoughBirds.message: Not enough birds available for quiz in this region. Please try a different region.
quizErrorNotEnoughBirds.description: Error message when not enough birds for quiz

quizErrorNotEnoughImages.message: Not enough bird images available. Please check your internet connection and try again.
quizErrorNotEnoughImages.description: Error message when not enough bird images could be loaded for quiz

quizErrorGeneral.message: Unable to start quiz. Please try again.

quizErrorOk.description: OK button for quiz error modal

quizLoadingQuestions.description: Loading message when preparing quiz questions

quizLoadingAnswers.description: Loading message when loading quiz answer options

quizLoadingImage.description: Loading message when loading bird image

correctAnswer.description: Shows the correct answer for a question

closeQuiz.description: Aria label for close quiz button

bingSearchAlt.description: Alt text for Bing search icon

eBirdPageAlt.description: Alt text for eBird page icon

startQuiz.description: Aria label for start quiz button

networkErrorTitle.description: Title for network error when no cached birds available

networkErrorMessage.message: We're having trouble connecting to our bird database. This might be due to network issues on your end or ours.

networkErrorSuggestion.message: Check your internet connection and try again. If this keeps happening, we'd love to hear from you!

linkCopied.description: Button text after link is copied

shareText.description: Default share text with bird name placeholder

videoModeHelpText.message: Show bird videos instead of photos when available. Videos include their own audio from the recording.
videoModeHelpText.description: Help text for video mode setting

videoModeTooltip.message: Enable to show bird videos instead of photos when available

videoUnavailableAlt.description: Alt text for video unavailable icon when connection is slow

videoUnavailableTooltip.message: Video unavailable: Your connection is slow (2G/3G) or data saver is enabled. Showing photo instead to save bandwidth.
videoUnavailableTooltip.description: Tooltip explaining why video is unavailable due to slow connection

videoNotAvailableForBird.message: No video available for this bird
videoNotAvailableForBird.description: Toast notification when user tries to switch to video mode but no video exists for the current bird species

emptyHistoryTitle.description: Title shown when history is empty

emptyHistorySubtitle.message: Discover new birds and they'll appear in your viewing history.
emptyHistorySubtitle.description: Subtitle shown when history is empty

confirmClearHistory.message: Are you sure you want to clear your viewing history?

justNow.description: Relative time: less than 1 minute ago

tourWelcomeDescription.message: Let us show you around! This quick tour will help you discover all the features that make your birding experience special.

tourCompleteDescription.message: Enjoy discovering beautiful birds from around the world. Happy birding!

tourStartButton.description: Feature tour: start button on welcome screen

tourDoneButton.description: Feature tour: done button on completion screen

tourNewFeature.description: Feature spotlight: badge for new features

tourHistoryDescription.message: See all the birds you've discovered! Click here to revisit your favorites and explore your birding journey.

tourVideoToggleDescription.message: Switch between photos and videos! Toggle this to watch birds in motion with beautiful video clips.

tourSettingsDescription.message: Customize your BirdTab experience. Choose your region, enable auto-play for bird calls, and more.

tourVolumeDescription.message: Adjust the volume to your preference. Control the sound of bird calls and videos to create your perfect birding experience.

tourRefreshDescription.message: Ready for a new feathered friend? Click here anytime to load a fresh bird photo and learn something new.

tourQuizDescription.message: Test your bird identification skills! Take a fun quiz to see how well you know your feathered friends.

tourFinishButton.description: Feature tour: finish button text on last step

resetTour.description: Button to reset the feature tour in debug section

tourReset.message: Feature tour has been reset. It will show again on the next page load.
tourReset.description: Success message after resetting the feature tour

errorResettingTour.description: Error message when tour reset fails

highResHelpText.message: Display ultra high-resolution 2400px bird photos for crystal-clear detail.
highResHelpText.description: Help text for high-resolution images setting
